metadata.name: Fruity Plum Challenge
metadata.description:
This is a joke mod based off of my [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2884230835]Little Beast Challenge[/url].
Start as a blindfolded Isaac riding A Pony. You'll get one Fruity Plum upgraded with Baby-Bender and Forgotten Lullaby. Travel through the Basement repeatedly until you face off against Baby Plum.
Starting items: [list] [*]Fruity Plum (familiar) [*]Baby-Bender (smelted trinket / gives familiars homing shots) [*]Forgotten Lullaby (smelted trinket / gives familiars higher rate of fire) [*]A Pony (pocket slot / flight) [*]AAA Battery (trinket / lets A Pony recharge after each room) [/list]
Items like the D4 shouldn't show up, but be careful. If you lose your Fruity Plum for any reason, that's a failure scenario. The whole point of this challenge is Baby Plum vs Fruity Plum.
You can play co-op if you want, but only the first player will get a Fruity Plum.
Recommended mods: [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2575180437]Baby Plum Trophy[/url] [/list]
